rev.desc.rev.desc: can not save after change category to release management because of invalid subcategory

Added a confirm.action panel that prompts users to confirm the category change - selecting yes will save the record with the new category and its first phase. Changed check.new.cat.name exit from phase.changed.msg to confirm.action.

Made changes in the apply.change panel. It was changed to clear out the reviewers and aprovers arrays if the category is actualy changed. The apply.change panel is a process panel, I simply added the following:
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
